entry.title: Responses to Moscow's Demands Show Gulf Between Russia and West
entry.content: The U.S. and NATO rejected the Kremlin’s demands about the alliance's expansion and instead blamed the tension on Russian President Vladimir Putin, details of two bluntly worded responses delivered to Moscow last week show.

entry.title: China Fortifies Its Borders With a 'Southern Great Wall,' Citing Covid-19
entry.content: Barbed wire, lights and cameras spring up, changing life for locals and making trade cumbersome. “Safeguard the sacred land.”
